description: Splits data into multiple subsets using various strategies including ratio-based, random, sequential, conditional, field value-based, and chunk size splitting.

data.info: Data to be split into multiple subsets. Can be a list of Data objects, single Data object, or JSON string.

split_strategy.info: Method for data splitting: ratio (percentage-based), random (random sampling), sequential (ordered chunks), conditional (rule-based), field_value (group by field), or chunk_size (fixed size chunks).

split_ratios.info: JSON array of decimal ratios for splitting data (e.g., [0.7, 0.2, 0.1] for 70%/20%/10% split).

split_conditions.info: JSON array of conditions for conditional splitting, each defining rules for subset creation.

split_field.info: Field name to use for field value-based splitting (groups records by field values).

chunk_size.info: Number of records per chunk when using chunk size splitting strategy.

random_seed.info: Seed value for random number generator to ensure reproducible random splits.

stratify_field.info: Field name to use for stratified sampling (maintains field value distribution across splits).

shuffle_data.info: Shuffle the data before splitting to ensure random distribution.

preserve_order.info: Maintain the original order of records within each split subset.

include_remainder.info: Include remaining records that don't fit exact ratios or chunk sizes in the last subset.

output_format.info: Format for split outputs: separate (individual outputs), combined (single output with split info), or indexed (numbered subsets).

subset_names.info: JSON array of custom names for the split subsets (e.g., ['train', 'validation', 'test']).

errors.no_data: No input data provided for splitting.
errors.empty_data: Input data is empty or contains no records.
errors.invalid_ratios: Split ratios must sum to 1.0 or less: {ratios}
errors.invalid_chunk_size: Chunk size must be greater than 0: {size}
errors.invalid_field: Split field '{field}' not found in data.
errors.invalid_json: Invalid JSON format in input data.
errors.insufficient_data: Insufficient data for the requested split strategy.
errors.no_split_run: Data splitting must be run before accessing this output.
